result.reason: Users need temporary targeting controls for broadcast SSH commands, and maintainers explicitly agreed with both per-connection and panel-level exclusion scenarios.
result.approach: Introduce transient include/exclude flags for active SSH tabs plus a panel-scope filter, then apply those filters when MultiSSH refreshes handlers and dispatches keystrokes.

attempts.raw_output: {"decision":"implement","reason":"Users need temporary targeting controls for broadcast SSH commands, and maintainers explicitly agreed with both per-connection and panel-level exclusion scenarios.","priority":"P3-enhancement","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/UI/Controls/MultiSshToolStrip.cs","mRemoteNG/UI/Window/ConnectionWindow.cs","mRemoteNG/Connection/ConnectionInfo.cs"],"approach":"Introduce transient include/exclude flags for active SSH tabs plus a panel-scope filter, then apply those filters when MultiSSH refreshes handlers and dispatches keystrokes."}
